TopicTitle: All asteroid disappearing in my Tracking Station view

Articles.Content:
I have migrated my saves from windows to ubuntu, steam install 12 common mods (kas, mechjeb2, some save-file agnostic mods, ~12 total). Full career, level 3 tracking station. After I cp'd the file I am getting no more new asteroid around Kerbin for almos a year. I have time-warped 2 years and I am having no more asteroids.

Is this normal? Any known workaround?

PS: I have active all 12 contract on my level 2 mission control.
